nodes.text: Tarrah Hill was the highest physical point on Aquilaris Minor, a water world in the Outer Rim's Grumani sector. It was a high hill and became a rendezvous point for Aquilarian flood refugees during the Great Aquilaris Deluge. The refugees were led by Kerra Holt and were subsequently evacuated by Joad Kreel in a Seacropper Submersible.
